Coinfection with other pathogens has been described in up to 40% of children with COVID‚Äê19, including influenza A and B, mycoplasma, respiratory syncytial virus, and cytomegalovirus.
4 This is the first report of coinfection with MTB. Airway obstruction due to MTB is known to be complicated by a viral infection, causing additional inflammation, thereby worsening the obstruction.
